#	 z_min = 0.05 	 z_max = 0.2

#	 fit_left_max = 3.0e-6 	 fit_right_max = 20.0 	 
#

#	 con = true 	 k_min = 1.0e-8 	 fit_min = 0.05 	 
#

# 	 effective redshift z_eff = 0.15045636096023227 
# 	 comoving s_min = 148.19200014657565 Mpc/h_0
